notesStmt.note: Yosef Al-Falaḳi: inscribed (folio 1r). 'Marchion' written on the margins in a few places where censor's erasures were to be made (e.g. 41v, 44v, 45r, 53r).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The first two books of Maimonides' Mishneh Torah.

collation.p: 11 quires of 10 leaves each and 1 (the last one) quire of 8 leaves. Quires numbered with Hebrew letters at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script of the 14th to 15th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine title: 'Yad Chazakah.Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1486.'
